contextId.glQuote: Please do not hide from me anything that I will ask you

contextId.occurrenceNote: This negative sentence is used for emphasis and can be stated in a positive form. Alternate translation: "We will kill every one of his men" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: We will not leave even one of his men ... alive

contextId.occurrenceNote: This negative sentence is used to emphasize that they all crossed the river. It can be stated in a positive form. Alternate translation: "By morning daylight every one of them had crossed over the Jordan" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-litotes]])
contextId.glQuote: By morning daylight not one of them had failed to cross over the Jordan
